basics.name: Anonymous
basics.label: Dining Services Coordinator
basics.summary: I have worked in fine dining, hotels, and in the hospital setting. I have been in the elderly care field for the last 20 years. I have menu creativity and excellent budget management. I ensure the effective management of the kitchen staff, maintain quality and taste while reducing costs, and pay strong attention to safe food handling procedures.

work.name: Brookdale Hampton Cove
work.summary: Efficient at purchasing, effectively managed kitchen staff in producing food for banquets, catered events etc., ensure cleanliness and safety in kitchen, managed employees and complied with state regulations
highlights: Managed kitchen staff and food production
Oversaw daily product inventory, purchasing and receiving
Stayed in budget and ordered supplies and food for housekeeping, nurses, and kitchen staff

work.name: Unknown Company
work.summary: Established and maintained open, collaborative relationships with the kitchen team, conducted staff meetings and resolved service, product and personnel issues. Coordinated nutrition care with health care team and established healthful and therapeutic meal plans and menus.

work.name: Unknown Company
work.summary: Communicated openly and honestly with the management team to ensure smooth running of each shift. Developed a stable staff and happy residents.

courses: Online courses for substance abuse counseling

skills.name: Kitchen Management
keywords: Strong attention to safe food handling procedures
